6. Bacteria: Disease entity. Bacteria are not normally present in urine, and their presence can indicate a urinary tract infection.
7. Crystals: Disease entity. The presence of crystals in urine can be a sign of kidney stones or other kidney diseases.
8. Culture: Not a disease entity. Culture is a diagnostic test used to identify the presence of bacteria or other microorganisms in urine.
